source.title: Select source collection and path
source.description: The source collection and path (path MUST end with a slash)

destination.title: Select destination collection and path
destination.description: The destination collection and path (path MUST end with a slash); default collection is 'Globus Tutorials on ALCF Eagle'

recursive_tx.title: Recursive transfer
recursive_tx.description: Whether or not to transfer recursively, must be true when transferring a directory.

principal_type.title: Type of principal to share with
principal_type.description: Specifies whether files are being shared with a user ('identity') or a group ('group'); default is 'group'

principal_identifier.title: UUID of user identity or group
principal_identifier.description: The user or group id to share with; default is 'Tutorial Users' group.

search_ingest_document.title: Search ingest document
search_ingest_document.description: The subject and metadata to be ingested into Globus Search

search_index.title: Globus Search Index ID
search_index.description: The UUID of the Globus Search index that will hold this metadata

search_subject.title: Globus Search Subject
search_subject.description: The target data subject for this index entry

search_entry_id.title: Entry ID
search_entry_id.description: Unique id for the public block of metadata

search_visible_to.title: Visible To
search_visible_to.description: Globus user(s) or group(s) that can view this metadata

search_content_metadata.title: Search Metadata
search_content_metadata.description: The metadata for this index entry

search_restricted_entry_id.title: Restricted Entry ID
search_restricted_entry_id.description: Unique id for the restricted block of metadata

search_restricted_visible_to.title: Visible To (for restricted metadata)
search_restricted_visible_to.description: Globus user(s) or group(s) that can view this restricted metadata

search_content_restricted_metadata.title: Restricted Search Metadata
search_content_restricted_metadata.description: The restricted metadata for this index entry
